entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 6:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 19 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
